metadata.description: Please， God... I just want to be happy and in love...!" Freshly dumped by a boy he thought could be the one， Naoyuki Shiba takes his friend up on an invitation to a mixer party， hoping to forget his sorrows for a night. But to his surprise， one of the boys there， Shou Yushima， is totally his type! Too bad he’s a little strange and acts like a jerk. Shibata’s convinced that he’s setting himself up for another heartbreak， but there’s more going on than he thinks in this cute romcom... This is Tatsumi Kaiya’s first yaoi， complete with an epilogue chapter and afterword!
metadata.name: Baby Maybe (Yaoi Manga)
